mapper.select:
SELECT OR.id, OR.refId, OR.refType, OR.lastUpdateDate, OR.lastUpdateOperatorId, OR.createDate, OR.createOperatorId, OR.expiryDate, OR.operatorId, OR.effectiveDate FROM OPER_OPERATOR_REF OR WHERE
AND OR.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_OPERATOR_REF ( id, refId, refType, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateOperatorId, createDate, createOperatorId, expiryDate, operatorId, effectiveDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{refId}, #{refType}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{createDate}, #{createOperatorId}, #{expiryDate}, #{operatorId}, #{effectiveDate} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM OPER_OPERATOR_REF WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPER_OPERATOR_REF
refId = #{refId,javaType=java.lang.String},
refType = #{refType,javaType=java.lang.String},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateOperatorId = #{lastUpdateOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
expiryDate = #{expiryDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
operatorId = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
effectiveDate = #{effectiveDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
